title: So I Am A Demon Descendent! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Harem   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Comedic Undertone   Demons   Handsome Male Lead   Inheritance   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Parallel Worlds   Polygamy   Romantic Subplot   Seven Deadly Sins   Time Travel   Weak to Strong

description:
When Li Xianyu was 20 years old, he received his father's inheritance, an 18-year-old great-grandmother who was incredibly beautiful.

Li Xianyu: 'Great-Grandma, why are you so young?'

Great-Grandma: 'That's because I died when I was 18 years old.' >
